content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[stg_Buildings]
(
    building_id NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
    parcel_id NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    use_type NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    year_built INT NULL,
    floors INT NULL,
    height_m FLOAT NULL,
    construction_status NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    permit_number NVARCHAR(64) NULL,
    regulatory_status NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    valuation_amount DECIMAL(18,2) NULL,
    owner_name NVARCHAR(200) NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
